name: @heiwa4126/clean-publish-scripts
description: A simple CLI tool to clean package.json during npm publish by removing development-specific fields like scripts, workspaces, and private.

scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run smoke-test
scripts.format:full: pnpm pkg fix && biome format --write . && dprint fmt && textlint --fix "**/*.md"
scripts.smoke-test: node smoke-test/st.mjs && node smoke-test/st.cjs && tsx smoke-test/st.ts && node dist/main.js --help
